title: Dracula: The Original Living Vampire
overview: Detective Amelia Van Helsing is on the desperate hunt for the killer responsible for a string of grisly murders targeting young women. Matters only worsen when all evidence leads to the seemingly untouchable Count Dracula. And when Van Helsingâ€™s girlfriend vanishes, she is forced to question the very existence of monsters in a final showdown with the enigmatic count.
